Headline: Temporary Northbound #4 Cottage Grove Reroute near Cottage Grove/84th
ShortDescription: Northbound 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted near Cottage Grove/84th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 87th, King Drive, 83rd, Cottage Grove, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Cottage Grove/84th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Chicago
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing near Chicago due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing near Chicago due to a mechanical problem.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include:

  • #36 Broadway buses
  • #66 Chicago buses
  • #151 Sheridan buses

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
